intro.npc_text: Welcome to the Gatekeeper Training. I'm your Tutorial Guide. Ready to learn?

options.text: Yes, show me how this works.

trust_lesson.npc_text: The bar at the top represents Trust. Helpful responses increase it, while dismissive ones decrease it.

options.text: I see. What about the icons?

clue_lesson.npc_text: Observations help you unlock deeper dialogue. You can see the 'Magnifying Glass' on some options.

options.text: Got it. How do I help someone in crisis?

refer_lesson.npc_text: At the end, you'll use the 'Refer' action to connect them to professional help.

options.text: I'm ready to try a real scenario!

success_tutorial.message: Tutorial Complete! You've learned the basics of Approach, Listen, and Refer. Now, let's head to the park.

beginning.npc_text: Hey. I didn't think anyone else would be out here this late.

options.text: It's a quiet spot. You come here often?
Are you okay? You look pretty down.
I saw this photo of a family back there... is it yours?

opening_up_clue.npc_text: Yeah... my kids. I don't know how I'm going to look them in the eye after what happened.

options.text: They love you, Sam. The situation doesn't define your value to them.

opening_up.npc_text: Used to. Now it's the only place where I don't feel like I'm failing everyone.

options.text: Failing everyone? That sounds heavy.
Don't say that. People care about you.

deep_pain.npc_text: I've lost the job, the house... I think everyone would just be better off if I wasn't around.

options.text: When you say 'better off', are you saying you're thinking about suicide?
You shouldn't think that. It'll get better.

direct_question.npc_text: I... I have the bottle in my bag. I was just sitting here waiting for the courage to do it.

options.text: I'm so glad you told me. I want to help you stay safe. Will you go with me to get some help?

persuade.npc_text: I don't know who to even call. I'm so lost.

options.text: [REFER: SELECT CRISIS RESOURCE FROM TOOLKIT]

toxic_positivity.npc_text: That's what they always say. But they don't see the mess I've made.

options.text: I'm sorry, I was minimizing. Tell me more about what's going on.
I'll give you some space, but I'm here if you need me.

success_end.message: Sam agreed to call the hotline.

leave_failure.message: You left Sam alone in a crisis.

beginning.npc_text: Twenty years... replaced by a script in twenty seconds. I can't believe it.

options.text: That sounds incredibly unfair. Do you want to talk about it?
I noticed the termination letter on your desk. Is that what happened?
Hey, at least you have free time now!

opening_up_clue.npc_text: They didn't even look me in the eye. Just left this paper. How do I tell my wife?

options.text: It's a terrible blow, but your family values you for who you are, not your job.

opening_up.npc_text: I don't know if talking fixes anything. The bills won't pay themselves.

options.text: It won't fix the bills, but you don't have to carry the panic alone.

deep_pain.npc_text: I'm worth more dead than alive with the insurance policy. Maybe that's the solution.

options.text: Are you thinking about killing yourself to help your family financially?
Don't talk like that, money isn't everything.

direct_question.npc_text: I... I was checking the policy. It pays out for suicide after two years. I'm past two years.

options.text: Your life is irreplaceable to your family. Let's find a way to get through this safely.
[REFER: SELECT CRISIS RESOURCE FROM TOOLKIT]

toxic_positivity.npc_text: Free time? I'm about to lose my home! You don't get it at all.

options.text: I'm so sorry, that was insensitive. I want to listen.

defensive.npc_text: You don't know anything about my finances. Go away.

options.text: I'll go.

leave_failure.message: You left Sam alone in a crisis.

beginning.npc_text: I studied for weeks. I did everything right. It's not enough.

options.text: Sounds like you put in a lot of effort.
I found this grade paper... looks like a tough semester.
It's just one test, you'll do better next time!

opening_up_clue.npc_text: My scholarship depends on this. If I lose it, I have to drop out. My parents will be so ashamed.

options.text: That is a huge pressure. But academic struggles don't make you a failure as a person.

opening_up.npc_text: Effort doesn't matter if the result is failure. I'm just wasting space here.

options.text: It sounds like you're being really hard on yourself.

deep_pain.npc_text: Top of my class in high school. Now? I'm nothing. Maybe I should just disappear.

options.text: When you say disappear, are you thinking about ending your life?
You just need to study harder, don't give up.

direct_question.npc_text: Ideally, yeah. I don't want to face them. I don't want to face any of it anymore.

options.text: I hear how much pain you're in. Please, let's talk to someone who can help with this pressure.
[REFER: SELECT THERAPIST RESOURCE]

toxic_positivity.npc_text: Next time? There is no next time! This was my shot.

options.text: I didn't realize the stakes were so high. I'm sorry.

defensive.npc_text: You sound like my professors. Just leave me be.

options.text: Okay.

success_end.message: Sam agreed to see a counselor.

leave_failure.message: You left Sam alone in a crisis.

beginning.npc_text: Just watching the cars go by. It would be so quick.

options.text: It sounds like you're in a really dark place right now.
Is this envelope yours? It looks like an eviction notice...
Don't jump!

opening_up_clue.npc_text: Yeah. Eviction. And she left me. All in one week. I have nowhere to go.

options.text: That is an avalanche of loss. It makes sense that you feel overwhelmed.

opening_up.npc_text: Quick is better than this slow drowning. I'm just tired of fighting.

options.text: You're tired of fighting alone. I'm here with you now.

deep_pain.npc_text: One step into traffic and the noise stops. Why shouldn't I?

options.text: Are you planning to step into traffic right now?
Because life is beautiful!

direct_question.npc_text: I'm trying to work up the nerve. I just want the pain to end.

options.text: I want the pain to end for you too, but not your life. Stay with me, let's call for help.

persuade.npc_text: I have no money, no home. Who helps someone like me?

options.text: [REFER: SELECT CRISIS RESOURCE]

defensive.npc_text: You don't know what you're talking about.

options.text: I'm leaving.

success_end.message: Sam stepped back from the curb.

leave_failure.message: You left Sam in immediate danger.
